title: Apollo to Purchase $1.6 Billion of Carvana Bonds
sub_head: Transaction revises previous financing plan, shows cracks in car retailer’s ability to raise easy money
body:
Apollo Global Management Inc. agreed to purchase about half of $3.275 billion of bonds Carvana Co. is issuing to acquire car-auction network ADESA U.S., bolstering the online car retailer’s troubled financing effort, people familiar with the matter said.
The transaction is a revision of a previous financing plan and shows cracks in the company’s ability to raise easy money from investors following a disappointing first-quarter earnings report.
